description.name: Description
description.value1: Persists the data set in some storage. The storage type can be tweaked by specifying/combining parameters.
description.value2: Overall, the configuration gives the ability to define:
description.value4: 2. Whether to drop the RDD to disk if it falls out of memory.
description.value5: 3. Whether to keep the data in memory in a serialized format.
description.value6: 4 .Whether to replicate the RDD partitions on multiple nodes.
description.value7: By default the cache parameters are set to reflect StorageLevel.MEMORY_AND_DISK mode.

useMemory.name: Use memory
useMemory.value: Data should be saved in RAM.

useOffHeap.name: Use off heap
useOffHeap.value: Objects will be managed by garbage collector.

replication.name: Replication
replication.value: Replicate the RDD partitions on multiple nodes.
